definition: variant of 記錄|记录[ji4 lu4] (but in Taiwan, not for the verb sense "to record")

sentences.english: I just wanted to write down everything the professor said and memorize it.
sentences.chinese: 我就是把教授講的話原原本本紀錄下來然後記住。

sentences.english: The previous record was held by an Indian man who delivered a 120-hour speech.
sentences.chinese: 此前的紀錄爲120小時，由一個印度人創造。

sentences.english: Make your records available to the local and national record committees.
sentences.chinese: 將自己的紀錄提供給地區或是全國性的紀錄委員會。

sentences.english: Make your records available to the local and national record committees.
sentences.chinese: 將自己的紀錄提供給地區或是全國性的紀錄委員會。

sentences.english: Global average temperature records are vital to understanding how the climate is changing.
sentences.chinese: 全球平均氣溫紀錄對認識氣候變化的過程至關重要。

sentences.english: It already has the top advance sales in history.
sentences.chinese: 這書已破了史上最高預訂紀錄。

sentences.english: Dishing the Dirt is a documentary series broadcast on ITV1.
sentences.chinese: 骯髒的食物是ITV1臺的系列紀錄片。

sentences.english: She had sex with 919 guys in a single day, setting a world record.
sentences.chinese: 她在一天和919個男人完成性愛，創造了世界紀錄。

sentences.english: Phelps' eight gold medals and seven world records left you in awe.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾普斯的八塊金牌和七項世界紀錄讓人肅然起敬。

sentences.english: Anyone who beats the record will win a season pass for four people for 2007 with VIP queue-jumping status.
sentences.chinese: 破紀錄者將能取得2007年四人份優先玩貴賓季卡。

sentences.english: This cluster of record-breaking events could be merely an streak of bad luck.
sentences.chinese: 這一連串破紀錄的事件也許只是一連串的黴運。

sentences.english: This record, however, was broken in the non-influential game at Reggio Calabria.
sentences.chinese: 不過這個紀錄還是在對雷吉那的比賽中被打破了。

sentences.english: He did rather well, but he failed to break the record.
sentences.chinese: 他幹得不錯，可惜沒破紀錄。

sentences.english: A record 4,000 athletes from 59 countries participated.
sentences.chinese: 創紀錄的4000運動員從59個國家參加了會議。

sentences.english: Last year he set the record with 9 hours and 33 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 在上一年他創造的紀錄是9小時33分鐘。

sentences.english: Well, was in Citizen Kane? In his documentary?
sentences.chinese: 是在《公民凱恩》裏，還是在他的紀錄片裏？

definition: to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
